ruleContent.content:
<js>
while(src.match(/访问太频繁了，奴家受不了啦/)){
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(10000)
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl)
	}
result=java.getString(".content@html",src)
result
</js>
